prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered pouring pose with hands managing flow between vessels, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or hexagonal crystalline appendages like sacred geometry horns incorporating hexagonal, merkaba, flower of life patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey transcendent layered robes combining all elemental patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for unity and synthesis, elaborate with shifting Spirit element pentagram motifs and unifying patterns and Star tetrahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like orb of mercy with hexagonal geometric surface with primordial spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rainbow essence wisps and transcendent particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor TABITOM's profile: 'He who is like fire', Aethyr ZAX, Spirit element, Tarot Temperance, Sephirot Chesed, Zodiac Sagittarius, embodying the essence: 'When TABITOM is near, a paradoxical sunlight fills the air a spirit-fire that neither burns nor dims...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered pouring pose with hands managing flow between vessels
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth
visual_elements.hair_style: hexagonal crystalline appendages like sacred geometry horns

outfit.base: transcendent layered robes combining all elemental patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for unity and synthesis
outfit.details: Spirit element pentagram motifs and unifying patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rainbow essence wisps and transcendent particles

visual_elements.accessory: orb of mercy with hexagonal geometric surface
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who is like fire'
profile_data.essence: When TABITOM is near, a paradoxical sunlight fills the air a spirit-fire that neither burns nor dims, but wholly transmutes.
profile_data.angelic_role: Throne of Sacred Flame; marshals oak-crowned hosts.
profile_data.form_description: A multifaceted prismatic form emerging from oak-wood crystalline structure, representing the intersection of spirit (fire) and earthly wisdom. The crystalline nature reflects the Governor Angel's role of transmutation and sacred vision.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Saffron represents spiritual fire and Sagittarian expansiveness; indigo symbolizes deep vision and spiritual insight. The shifting pattern reflects the dynamic nature of ZAX Aethyr's transformative energy.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structure represents perfect spiritual geometry, Merkaba symbolizes light vehicle transformation, Flower of Life indicates cosmic interconnectedness
